threat: A local attacker could use this attack to possibly recover private keys.
A local attacker could use this attack to possibly recover private keys.

If a user or automated system were tricked into opening a malformed keyring, a remote attacker could use this issue to cause GnuPG to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.
special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
